item.title: Use Go interfaces
item.description: tl;dr: from\to io.Writer io.Reader string []byte bytes.Buffer io.Writer – io.Pipe io.WriteString N/A N/A io.Reader io.Copy – strings.Builder N/A N/A string bytes.NewBufferString strings.NewReader – []byte(“io”) []byte bytes.NewBuffer bytes.New{Reader/Buffer} string(byteSlice) – bytes.NewBuffer bytes.Buffer it’s it’s buf.String buf.bytes – Go has become a very popular language, so there’s day to day multiple posts and tutorials.
